descriptionHtml:
Hi!
I am Japanese.
So sorry if my grammar is wrong.

This is a batch file.
If you use this your follower will become very strong!!
You\'re follower gets all Perks, All skills will be at 100, Health, Magicka and Stamina will be at 5000, Carryweight will be 200000 and Speed will be x1.4 if you use this file.

~Installation~
1:Download file.
2:Please put it in the \"Skyrim\" folder before the \"Data\" folder.
3:Done!

~Uninstallation~
1:Delete the file.
2:Done!

~How to use~
1:Open the console.
2:Click the Follower\'s who you want to be stronger.
3:Please type \"bat C\".
4:Done!

If you use this file, the balance of the game could be broken.
So, please be careful when using.

~About Pictures~
Sorry,I have only JP version.
But view of roughly the same.
I use the UFO to check the status.

~Special Thanks~
?Adipsycho
He helped with the translation and provided the photos.
Thanks so much!
author: Pontaso
